frontmatter.title: Data Scientist and Web Frontend Enthusiast
frontmatter.subtitle: I am MantiMantilla
frontmatter.content: Hello! and welcome to my website. My name is Alejandro, though most call me Alejo. Get to know me by looking around this site or by visiting my social media. You are welcome to stay for as long as you like. Alejo says trans rights and BLM. ‚úäüèΩ
